bio: My name is Ndukwe Nkiruka. I'm 25 years old.  I'm a college student. And I have a deep interest for the crypto space.
contributionDescription:
I use the optimism chain frequently, I have voted in optimism snapshots. I have also delegated tokens a number of times.

 I follow optimism on Twitter, engage on posts relating to optimism. I frequently like, retweet, quote and share your posts frequently on social media platforms. 

I really hope to see your project grow further and further. 

Having one of the lowest fees in the crypto space, I encourage friends and partners to trade your coin as well as hold. I have been following optimism since pre-launch and haven't for a single moment doubted the project. 


If eventually I launch my token someday, it would definitely be on the optimism chain. 

As an aspiring project starter, it's my dream to work with you someday.
impactDescription:
The impact of my contribution in the optimism collective has help optimism grow both as a Blockchain as well as a token. 

I frequently engage on social media posts involving optimism in order to promote the project. 

Having one of the lowest fees in the crypto space, I encourage friends and partners to trade your coin as well as hold. 

I look forward to a bright future with optimism and I really hope to work with you someday.
